explanation: [0-0] A little boy in a red T-shirt is standing on the grass outside a tent, his hands stretched out to the sides. A woman in a purple top is kneeling inside the tent, organizing things. The tent is purple with circles and has an orange top. It is raining, and there is a mud puddle below.
